channel.title: I have ubuntu 6.0.0.1 and i need help installing
channel.description:
ok i ran it off the live cd and i love it so i went to install and then it comes up with lag.. and i finish the first question and its going to the second question... by that time its lagging so bad it freezez up.. :mad: and i cant get it to work! and i realy don't like windows and i think linux is a ton better... i got 256mb of ram and a 40gig hard drive thats the right requirments for it... but can anyone help me to get it installed? that would be greatfull knowing that i dont want to redownload anything becuase it takes 15hr's with my slow internet... thanks
~ rune

item.title: I have ubuntu 6.0.0.1 and i need help installing
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

The problem probably is your ram. 256 MB is very… very slow. Though, you should still be able to install Ubuntu.

Anyway, if you back up your computer (if you have Windows or some other OS on your computer) you can try to install it by going in to your Windows OS and then running an exe file.

Here is the tutorial, but beware, as this has a chance it will not work. It’s supposed to work, but please back up your computer before trying.
http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=427540

~Ron

Read full topic
item.source: I have ubuntu 6.0.0.1 and i need help installing
